values: To pray is to speak to God in order to ask for help or to give thanks.
The girl likes to pray for world peace.

- vt. 祈祷；恳求；央求
- vi. 祈祷；恳求；请


时 态:  
prayed, praying, prays
祈祷， 祈求； 请求， 恳求
vt.祈祷，祷告,请求，恳求,央求vi.祈祷,请,恳求
v. 请求，恳求；祈祷，祈求
v. 请求，恳求；祈祷，祈求
请求， 恳求；祈祷， 祈求
vi.祈祷；请；恳求vt.祈祷；恳求；央求
祈祷, 祷告, 祈求, 求 (verb.)
To pray is to communicate with a higher power or deity, often asking for guidance, help, or forgiveness.
Pray means in a way that is related to religious worship or asking for help from a higher power.
vi. 祈祷；请；恳求,vt. 祈祷；恳求；央求
